attributes.action: To make Nigel Farage a Lord. He would be a valued asset to parliament.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage for the greater time of his political career has upheld democracy and the interest and values of the United Kingdom. He has represented the Great Britain in the European Parliament with passion. He has accomplished many victories and upheld the Great Britain’s traditions of the country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.

Anyone can nominate someone for non-party political membership of the House of Lords. You can find out more here:

http://lordsappointments.independent.gov.uk/how-to-apply.aspx
